TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow/DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括允许你的应用程序以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的内置辅助功能支持。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕放大器和审阅者实用工具、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自类来提供以下信息辅助功能客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 每个类表示的可视部件-如， ，和-还包含继承自的类提供有关包含的类信息和执行代表辅助功能客户端应用程序的操作。Each class that represents a visual part of the —such as , , and —also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有实例时想要提供其他信息，例如名称或描述控件，辅助功能客户端应用程序。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的和将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 应更改和属性值仅在极少数情况下，例如，如果你使如下所示列表。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，你可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或可访问性不同操作，将您的自定义包括或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，你可以编写您自己的类派生自或类并重写方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果你正在编写实现唯一的自定义操作，例如在你的单元格中，特殊命中测试的自定义的行标题单元格应创建继承自的类类并重写方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 使用来公开其数据结构值来定义数据表层次结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 公开到 Microsoft Active Accessibility 数据表的详细信息，请参阅"公开数据表通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了，方法将返回每个`navdir`值。The following table describes the that the method will return for each `navdir` value. |参数值Parameter value|返回值Return value| |---------------------|------------------| | 或 or |辅助性对象当前行的下方。An accessible object for the below the current row.| | 或 or |辅助性对象当前行的上方。An accessible object for the above the current row.| ||辅助性对象的第一个行中。An accessible object for the first in the row. 是第一个单元格，如果是`true`。The is the first cell if is `true`.| ||对于上一个辅助性对象行中。An accessible object for the last in the row.| |所有其他值All other values|`null`。`null`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Select(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection flags) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Select (flags As AccessibleSelection)

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 修改选择内容或移动辅助性对象的键盘焦点。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的操作，方法将执行每个`flags`值。The following table describes the action that method will perform for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||获取焦点。The takes focus.| ||行中获取焦点。The in the row takes focus.| ||添加到属性。The is added to the property.| ||从删除属性。The is removed from the property.| 当指定值的列当前具有焦点等同于将在当前获得焦点的单元格。When you specify the value, the column of the that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current . 例如，如果第 10，单元格 3 行具有焦点，并且您指定单元格 3 将行 15，则行 15，具有焦点。For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus. 行中的第一个单元将获得焦点，如果没有中具有焦点。The first cell in the row will take focus if no in the has focus.
